TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EdmToObjectNamespaceMap extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of conceptual model to code namespace mappings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The namespace mappings are used by the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityClassGenerator> class to specify a different code namespace for generating code than what is specified in the CSDL file. The namespace mappings are consulted when a reference to a type is to be generated. If an entry is found, the value will be used to generate the qualified reference to the type; otherwise, the CSDL namespace will be used.
